mapper.insert: insert into mg_category (category_name, category_type, sale_type, price, part_id, color_id, suit_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by) values (#{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{partId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update mg_category set category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_type = #{categoryType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_type = #{saleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_id = #{colorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suit_id = #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, category_name, category_type, sale_type, price, part_id, color_id, suit_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by,status from mg_category where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select category_id, category_name, category_type, sale_type, price, part_id, color_id, suit_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by,status from mg_category
select category_id, category_name, category_type, sale_type, price, part_id, color_id, suit_id, owner_id, insert_time, insert_by,status from mg_category where part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
